meta.title: AVA Newport - Apartments in Costa Mesa, CA | AvalonBay Communities | AvalonBay Communities

meta.name: title
meta.content: AVA Newport - Apartments in Costa Mesa, CA | AvalonBay Communities

meta.name: description
meta.content: Take a tour of AVA Newport's studio, one-, two- and three-bedroom apartments. The urban-inspired design extends beyond your walls to cool spaces inside and out.

a.class: pricing-cw-price font-primary font-weight-bold d-flex align-items-center font-primary-theme
pricing-cw-price font-primary font-weight-bold d-flex align-items-center font-primary-theme
pricing-cw-price font-primary font-weight-bold d-flex align-items-center font-primary-theme
pricing-cw-price font-primary font-weight-bold d-flex align-items-center font-primary-theme
pricing-cw-price font-primary font-weight-bold d-flex align-items-center font-primary-theme

button.class: pricing-cw-modal-trigger font-primary font-18 line-height-1 font-weight-light d-flex align-items-center flex-wrap btn btn-borderless font-primary-theme

img.alt: Chill terrace with globe string lights.

span.style: text-size-adjust: 100%; font-family: 'Costa Std', serif !important; color: rgb(236, 0, 140) !important; font-weight: 400; white-space: pre; font-size: 3rem; line-height: 2.75rem; padding-left: 1.875rem;

div.style: color: rgb(236, 0, 140) !important; font-size: 1.75rem; vertical-align: top; display: inline-block;

img.alt: Portrait of tattooed young man with sun glasses.

a.div: You already love this neighborhood. So, what are you waiting for? Get out there. Breathe it in. We’re giving you access to it all with plenty of space to get away from it all for when you need to recharge.

img.alt: Retro styled bicycle parked on city sidewalk.

a.div: When we say we’ll hook you up, we mean it. Phone charging stations and common areas with Wi-Fi help keep you connected. Oh, and then there’s the fitness center, parking and bike storage so you can stay on the move hassle-free. Told you.

img.alt: Three stylish young women posing together against an urban background.

a.div: Whether it’s an evening spent binge-watching the latest true crime docuseries or a lively game night in the lounge, you like to play host, and hey, a little apartment-envy from your friends never hurt.

div.div: Room dimensions, square footage, and features shown on the floor plan drawings are approximate and may vary between individual apartments that have similar layouts. Furniture shown on the floor plan drawings is representative and individual apartments come unfurnished unless specified otherwise. Quoted rent is per month for new move-ins to the community, based on the move-in date selected. Pricing may vary based on lease term. Quoted rent does not including other fees and charges that may be part of your lease (i.e. utilities, parking, etc.). Please contact the community for details. Prior to signing a lease, quoted rent, specials, availability, and other terms and conditions are subject to change without notice. Washington State - We require our own screening and do not accept comprehensive reusable tenant screening reports.

div.p: Curious about the community layout? You can download the community site map here.

div.class: ant-typography feature-card-desc font-default text-center font-weight-normal text-center

a.div: Your pet is part of the fam, and that’s why we take pet-friendly living to the next level. Plus, who could say “no” to that face?

div.class: ant-typography feature-card-desc font-default text-center font-weight-normal text-center

a.div: Find your fit at AVA. Whether you’re hitting the weights, the trails, or the yoga mat, we’ve got your back.

div.class: ant-typography feature-card-desc font-default text-center font-weight-normal text-center

a.div: Our technology package gives you ease of access and can allow you to save on monthly expenses.

div.class: ant-typography feature-card-desc font-default text-center font-weight-normal text-center

a.div: Start earning points on rent with our free residents reward program. Use your points for travel, future rent credit, fitness classes, and more.

div.class: ant-typography feature-card-desc font-default text-center font-weight-normal text-center

a.div: Pay rent, find policies, and more with our convenient online resident portal.

div.class: ant-typography feature-card-desc font-default text-center font-weight-normal text-center

a.div: Offering a wealth of resident resources, our Relocation Advantage program assists in making your transition a smooth one.

h3.class: ant-typography community-amenities-title font-primary font-24 text-default font-weight-normal

div.div: EV outlets and charging stations. View more details
Conveniently located next to public transportation, shopping, dining and area attractions
Cats and dogs are welcome. Please check the dog breed and pet restrictions. View more details
Select apartments have in-unit washer/dryers. On site laundry facilities are conveniently located for all residents to access.

div.class: community-contact-info-mobile-bg absolute-top absolute-bottom community-contact-info-bg-overlay h-100 w-100 d-none-md

div.p: Give us a shout to learn more about AVA. We know you’ll like what we have to say.

li.a: Do Not Sell/Share My Personal Information

","description":"AVA Newport's apartments in Costa Mesa are a new kind of living space by Newport's Back Bay. Located just off the Costa Mesa Freeway and minutes from Newport beach, this is a choice neighborhood where tacos meet sushi, double espressos meet green tea and yoga, and shopping depends on your mood of the moment. From Union Jack Fish & Chips and Peet's Coffee & Tea to Lions Park and Triangle Square Shopping Center, there is always something exciting to engage within the community.Our studios and 1-, 2- and 3-bedroom Costa Mesa apartments feature newly renovated kitchens and urban-inspired design that extends beyond your walls to cool spaces inside and out. Hang in the loft or head for the pool. There are outdoor chill spaces with Wi-Fi and barbecues and an awesome fitness center. Hey, we don't want to tell you where or how to live, but you might want to check out the premier Orange County apartment community – AVA Newport. Click the Contact Us button above and discover your new apartment in Costa Mesa today.Newport Apartments by Avalon The great location isn’t our only plus point; you will also find that the Costa Mesa apartments have the latest features and are just steps from the best local hotspots, including Lions Park and Triangle Square Shopping Center. Stroll around Costa Mesa and discover a whole new world of adventures.Newport Apartment Community Being part of AVA Newport means that you will enjoy more time to focus on a healthy and happy lifestyle instead of worrying about things like apartment maintenance or upkeep. Plus, our technology package, AVA Connect, offers high-speed and common area WiFi, electronic locks, and digital resident services including the ability to submit service requests and pay your rent online, and more. So what are you waiting for? Dive in and make our Costa Mesa apartments your new home today.","previewWordCount":50},"displayProperties":{},"localEdits":{},"variants":{}}},{"collection":"features","type":"CORE_CommunityDetailPage/PricingOverview","props":{"collection":"features","type":"CORE_CommunityDetailPage/PricingOverview","id":"f0fdkNJFSsCn2VC","contentConfig":{"contentService":"","contentConfigValues":{},"inherit":true},"customFields":{"imgSrc":"https://cloudfront-us-east-1.images.arcpublishing.com/avalonbay/OOZS7JFGSFCF3MDFDSQ3VMWQUQ.jpg","imgAlt":"Chill terrace with globe string lights.","furnishedDescription":"Furnished+ offers all the essential items you need to move in plus conveniences like flexible lease terms, included utilities, and immediate access to highspeed Wi-Fi and cable TV."},"displayProperties":{},"localEdits":{},"variants":{}}},{"collection":"features","type":"Global/HTMLBox","props":{"collection":"features","type":"Global/HTMLBox","id":"f0f0ecMBKcDE5tv","contentConfig":{"contentService":"","contentConfigValues":{},"inherit":true},"customFields":{"HTML":"Where We Want, \n We Live.
